addon.name: Kodi Libretro Buildbot Game Addons LE Generic

extension.summary: Kodi Libretro Buildbot Game Addons LE Generic
extension.description: Kodi Libretro Buildbot Game Addons is a repository that builds kodi game binary addons directly from the libretro buildbot for LibreElec Generic (x86_64) systems
